name: Where are you? (vidak, ZdravkoN, thef006, jjovanovski)
name_original: Where are you? (vidak, ZdravkoN, thef006, jjovanovski)
description:
You and your friend are lost on an island, and the only means of communication you have is a walkie-talkie. Look around, explore your environment and try to find each other! Keep track of any landmarks you find and talk things out to help you find each other easily.

Created for Global Game Jam Online 2021, by  thef006, jjovanovski, zdravkon and vidak.

POST JAM UPDATE:

  • Added randomized spawning points for players.
  • Improved lighting and shadows.
  • Cleaned up UI.
  • Fixed some collision issues.
  • Added builds for both 64bit and 32bit Windows.
